body:
@martinwicke auto-wrapping non-layer ops as layer should not be an issue (once we figure out serialization). 

But in this specific case, a global pooling layer has valuable benefits: because it includes a `data_format` argument which can have a global default, it enables you to build convnets where you can switch from NCHW to NHWC in one click.
